text: [Ej ummati Muhammad] Sumo ʙehtarin ummate hasted, ki ʙaroi mardum padidor sudaed: Ba kori nek farmon medihed va az kori nopisand ʙozmedored va ʙa Alloh taolo imon dored; va agar ahli kitoʙ [niz] imon meovardand, hatman, ʙarojason ʙehtar ʙud; ʙarxe az onon mu'minand va [ammo] ʙestarason [fosiqu] nofarmonand
